cogsnap.name: Cogsnap
cogsnap.description: The tinkerer Cogsnap is a tragic sort of gnome known as a bleachling lunatic. The bleaching is a process gnomes go through when deprived of stimulation; they slowly whiten and die if not exposed to massive reinvigoration. An explosion in Cogsnap’s family’s fireworks factory brought him back to health. Now he dedicates himself to the improvement of people’s lives through detonative chemistry. His whizbang pursuit of mechanical reinvention has come at the cost of a few toes, though not his own.

damiel.name: Damiel
damiel.description: The possibilities of alchemy have always fascinated the alchemist Damiel. Delving deep into the ancient elixirs and formulas of Kyonin, his research took a daring turn when he started using himself as a test subject. Following a spate of unsolved crimes, Damiel was banished from his elven homeland. Wandering the world has only deepened his thirst for knowledge, giving him ample opportunities to fuel his addiction to ever-greater secrets.

mother-myrtle.name: Mother Myrtle
mother-myrtle.description: The caves of the Mindspin Mountains host a wide variety of fungi and creatures that skittle among them. These are the essential ingredients of Mother Myrtle’s brews and pastes, all reeking of earth and decay. For those that can stomach a goldbelly stinkbug and puffball roux, deep knowledge and power await. Her concoctions can make you very ill or much healthier, often in that order. Take heed: if Mother Myrtle offers you some mushrooms, you should eat your mushrooms.
